note.p: Civil servant. Employed in the Secretary's Office at the East India Office, 1818–58. Compiled the India List, 1829–58. Clerk in charge of ecclesiastical registrations 1841–58; also official agent to the administrators general in India from 1853.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1770/49/25), 1861 (RG9/8/11/16), 1871 (RG10/20/72/16)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 7 December 2015)
